entries.value: Want to know everything about your partner? Get ready for sweet questions and heart-fluttering actions made for couples!
Soft is too tame! Ready to turn up the heat? Get ready for heart-pounding questions and actions that take it to the next level.
Time to play like grown-ups...  Ready to explore those hidden fantasies? We're turning the spiciness way up! You might need a drink for this one...
Ready to find your limits? This is the ultimate level for a massive dopamine rush. Dare to unlock your Deepest Secrets?
Return to Home?

Bottoms up! Now, ask your partner to do the same. 1
Eat a snack and act like it's the best food on Earth for 5 sec! Fail? Take a penalty drink! 1
Kiss your partner's hand like a knight, then politely offer them a drink. 1
Stand up and strike your most confident "main character" pose for 5 sec! If you act shy, take a drink! 1
Rate your love for your partner from 1 to 10! Clap that many times, then take a drink! 1
"May I please have a drink?" Ask your partner sweetly for permission, then drink. 1
Pour a drink and politely hand it to your partner. (They must down it!) 1
Challenge your partner to a staring contest! The first person to laugh takes a drink. 1
Play Rock Paper Scissors! If you lose, take two drinks. If you win, take (just) one. 1
Name 3 good things about your partner in 10 sec! Fail? Down two drinks!  1
Tell your corniest dad joke! If your partner doesn't laugh, take a drink. 1
Sweetly feed your partner one bite of a snack, then you take a drink with satisfaction! 1
Cleanse your palate with a glass of water (down it!), then follow up with one shot of alcohol (down it!) 1
For 5 sec, make a face like a commercial model tasting this drink! Then, take a drink.  1
Make a special cocktail together with your partner. You take the first sip! 1
Say, "If I finish this drink, you're mine," then down it! 1
Take a selfie with your best "pic of a lifetime" face! If your partner doesn't like it, take a drink! 1
"Cheers!" to your partner with love! Clink glasses, then drink. 1
Recite the most romantic movie line you know, then take a drink. 1
Drink half your glass, then hand it to your partner and say, "The rest is for you." 1
Compliment one specific part of your partner (e.g., "Your smile is lovely"), then take a drink! 1
Say, "I'm getting drunk on you..." then stare deeply into your partner's eyes for 5 sec and drink.  1
Do 3 squats while holding your drink, then take a drink! 1
Get your partner to say "I love you" to you! If you can't (T_T), you drink two! 1
Gently pinch your partner's cheek, say "Cute!" and then take a drink! 1
For the next 5 min, only use a foreign language! Drink one every time you use your native language.  1
Drink one glass with the happiest face in the world. 1
Challenge your partner to a hand-pushing game! If you lose, take a drink. 1
Show off a personal talent (finger wave, funny face, etc.) and drink! If you have none, drink two! 1
Change your voice to a baby voice and say, "Pwease give me a dwink~" then drink. 1
High-five your partner, and then both of you drink at the same time! 1
Give your partner a shoulder massage. If you hear a "Thank you," mission complete! Take a drink! 1
Challenge your partner to an arm-wrestling match! (Go easy on them?) If you lose, take a drink! 1
Blow a kiss to your partner! (Then act shy) and quickly drink one! 1
Make the stupidest face you can with your partner and take a selfie! Then, one drink each! 1
Pat your partner on the back, say, "You worked hard today," and take a drink. 1
Say what animal your partner resembles! (e.g., a cute hamster?) If they agree, one drink each! 1
Name one thing you and your partner have in common! (e.g., We're both cute!) Then, take a drink! 1
Talk about the moment you first felt a spark for your partner, then take a drink. 1
Talk about a moment when you felt most grateful to your partner, then take a drink. 1
Gently feed your partner a bite of a snack with your mouth (or lips), then you take a drink. 1
Raise your glass high! Shout, "To our brilliant life!" and down it! 1
If your partner's glass is empty, fill it to the brim (with love!), then you drink one, too! 1
Imitate the most popular internet meme/phrase you know (e.g., "You?") and take a drink! 1
Challenge your partner to a "Who can make the best 'Ahhh~' sound after drinking" game! If you lose, drink one. 1
Try to get a snack from your partner by acting cute (e.g., "Pwease give me one~"). Fail? Drink one. 1
Show your partner your most recent search query on your phone! If it's embarrassing, drink two! 1
Take a selfie (for their wallpaper?) with your partner's phone, then take a drink, feeling satisfied! 1
Hold your partner's hand and look into their eyes for 10 sec without saying anything. Then, one drink each.  1
Shout your favorite toast (e.g., "To us!") and take a drink! 1
Guess what your partner is thinking right now! (e.g., "Me?") If you're wrong, take a drink! 1
Close your eyes, take a sip, and then describe the feeling in one word (e.g., "Sweet"). 1
Ask your partner, "Am I... drunk?" If they say "No," drink one more! 1
Make your partner laugh! Right now! If you succeed, they drink. If you fail, you drink. 1
For the next 3 min, it's a forbidden word game! If you say the word "Drink," you have to drink!  1
Send a "Miss you" text to the last person you called (Mom...?). If you can't, drink two! 1
Tell your partner a small secret (TMI) they didn't know about you, then take a drink. 1
Gently bump foreheads ("Bop!") with your partner, say "Cute!" and one drink each! 1
Gently pinch your partner's nose, then take a playful drink. 1
For the next 5 min, only use your nicknames for each other! (e.g., "Babe~") Drink one if you say their real name!  1
Challenge your partner to a thumb war! (Going to let them win again?) If you lose, take a drink! 1
Go get the object furthest from you right now! Fail? Take a drink! 1
Compliment your partner's eye color! (e.g., "Your eyes are like brown stars") Then, take a drink! 1
Say, "If I were born again, I'd want to be a ," and then take a drink. 1
Reveal your most embarrassing childhood nickname and take a drink! 1
Keep trying to get a compliment from your partner! (e.g., "Notice anything different?") Once you get one, drink! 1
Confess the body part you are least confident about... (sigh...) and drink one as "comfort alcohol." 1
Honestly confess your alcohol tolerance, and then drink one "just to check." 1
Reenact the worst drinking habit you've ever seen (TMI, acting bossy...) for 5 sec and drink. 1
Stare at your reflection in your partner's drink for 5 sec... then drink.  1
Brag about your most useless talent (e.g., touching your nose with your tongue) and take a drink! 1
Right now, say "Ho ho ho... give me a drink, young one" in a voice 10 years older, and drink! 1
Right now, say "Um... just one drink, pwease!" in a voice 10 years younger, and drink! 1
Promise your partner, "I'll take the next drink for you!" and you drink this one. 1
Fill your mouth with snacks and say "I... wuv... you!" If your pronunciation is bad, drink! 1
For 1 min, you are the King/Queen and your partner is the servant. Give a command (e.g., "Pour my drink!"), then drink.  1
Show the funniest photo (a bad one?) from your phone's gallery and take a drink! 1
Impersonate your partner (their tone, their expressions)! If they don't approve, take a drink! 1
Say, "The alcohol tastes sweet today..." to set a romantic mood, and take a drink. 1
Stare at your partner's face for 3 sec... then blurt out "Pretty/Handsome" and take a drink. 1
Whisper something (today's TMI?) in your partner's ear. If they laugh, you drink! 1
Brag about the most flexible part of your body (finger bending?) and take a drink. 1
Show off a trick with your tongue! (e.g., a clover?) If your partner doesn't laugh, take a drink! 1
Suggest a "Telepathy" game! (e.g., "Ready, 1-2-3!") If you fail to say the same word, you drink. 1
Describe your ideal type in 3 conditions (e.g., kind, funny, only sees me...) and take a drink. 1
Say which of those ideal conditions your partner meets, and take a drink. 1
Count all the drinks you've had so far... clap that many times, and take a drink! (If you don't remember, 3 drinks!) 1
Hold your drink and shout, "I'm the most charming person here!" and down it! 1
Tell your partner, "You're sexiest when you're drinking," and take a drink. 1
Imitate an expression your partner often makes! If they don't laugh because it's not accurate, drink one! 1
Tell your (TMI) first kiss story in a 10-sec summary, and take a drink!  1
Say how your first impression of your partner differs from your current impression, then drink. 1
Do something to prove you still have a "romantic side" (e.g., a hand kiss?) and take a drink! 1
Show your "signature move" for charming someone at a bar, and take a drink! 1
Hold your partner's hand tightly, say "Let's be together for a long time," and one drink each! 1
Propose a toast "to celebrate us meeting today" and take a drink! 1
Suggest something you want to do together next vacation, and one drink each with excitement! 1
Listen to one of your partner's worries (work, studies, etc.). Then, one drink each as a "toast of comfort." 1
Say "You did a great job today" to encourage each other, and one drink each! 1
Take a drink, then give your partner a warm back hug for 10 seconds.  2
Give your partner a light kiss on the forehead! (Then act shy) and take a drink! 2
Take a drink, say "I need to recharge..." and hug/cuddle your partner for 15 sec.  2
Kiss your partner's cheek! Then have them kiss your cheek! (Smooch x2) Then drink together! 2
Take a drink, then gently stroke your partner's hair for 20 seconds.  2
Give your partner a back hug and feed them a drink. Then, you drink one, too! 2
Say, "You look especially pretty/handsome today," stroke your partner's chin, and drink. 2
(Down your drink!) Then say, "Did I do a good job?" and ask your partner for a congratulatory hug. 2
Say, "I think I'm... drunk," then lean your head on your partner's shoulder and take a drink. 2
Link your fingers (interlace) with your partner's, make eye contact, and take a drink. 2
Take a drink, then say cheesily, "I'm having trouble drinking... because I'm too busy thinking of you." 2
Pretend to wipe something off your partner's lips with your finger... then take a drink. 2
Kiss your partner's hand (gently), then drink one, trying to look cool. 2
Link arms for a "Love Shot" and drink! Then, stare into each other's eyes for 10 sec. Loser drinks one more!  2
Try to make your partner say "I love you" to you! Success? Drink together! Fail? You drink two! 2
Honestly say, "I want to kiss you right now," and take a drink. 2
Take a drink, then whisper "I missed you today" in your partner's ear. 2
Take your partner's wrist and place their hand over your heart. "...Can you feel it?" Then, drink. 2
Put down your drink. Stare at your partner with eyes full of adoration for 10 sec... then drink.  2
Give your partner a light peck on the neck, then drink one as if nothing happened. 2
"What part of me made you fall for me?" Ask your partner, and drink as you listen to the answer. 2
"Should we... stay together all night?" Hint at it subtly, and take a drink. 2
"When did you fall for me?" Ask your partner, and (shyly) take a drink as you listen. 2
Take a drink, then stare intently at your partner's collarbone for 5 seconds.  2
Compare your hand size with your partner's (palm to palm)! If your hand is smaller, act cute and drink. 2
Say, "Tempt me." After watching your partner's attempt, drink one as the "judge." 2
Gently place your leg over your partner's leg and take a drink. 2
Take a drink, then whisper, "What do your lips taste like?" 2
Drink one while gently fiddling with your partner's earlobe. 2
Leave a lipstick mark on your glass and hand it to your partner. Then, drink one from a new glass. 2
Take a drink, then compliment your partner: "You know... you're pretty sexy today." 2
Drink one while fiddling with your partner's necktie/necklace/collar. 2
Take a drink, then ask subtly, "You're... going to take me home, right?" 2
Under the table, secretly tickle your partner's foot/leg for 5 sec. Then, take a drink.  2
Take a drink, then ask, "Do you... want to be with me more?" 2
Tell your partner your favorite type of skinship (e.g., back hugs), and take a drink. 2
Take a drink, then gently touch and compliment each of your partner's fingers (e.g., "This one is pretty"). 2
Lean your head on your partner's shoulder, say "Let's... stay like this for a bit," and take a drink. 2
Take a drink, and tell your partner, "This drink tastes even better because I'm with you." 2
Compliment their perfume (or scent), lean in close to their neck pretending to smell it... and take a drink. 2
You drink one, then say, "Next time, it's your turn to feed me." 2
Gently brush your partner's hair back behind their ear, and take a drink. 2
Say, "I'll tell you a secret," then whisper "I like you" in your partner's ear and take a drink. 2
Take a drink, then say, "I... don't feel like going home tonight." 2
Press your foreheads together and hold it for 10 seconds! Then, one drink each!  2
Take a drink, then ask meaningfully, "What are... we?" 2
Name a date you want to go on (e.g., "Want to see a movie tomorrow?"). If they say yes, take a drink! 2
Take a drink, and say sincerely, "I want to spend more time with you." 2
Stare intently at your partner's lips for 5 seconds... then take a drink.  2
Take a drink, then ask provocatively, "Can you... handle me?" 2
(Shyly) talk about the best kiss you've ever had, then take a drink. 2
Take a drink, then ask seriously, "What do I mean to you?" 2
Write a ticklish message on your partner's palm. If they guess what it is, they drink. If not, you drink! 2
Say, "I'm... seducing you right now," make your sexiest face, and take a drink. 2
Show your partner your favorite photo of the two of you together, then drink to the memory. 2
Take a drink, then ask, "What will you give me if I act cute?" 2
Tell your partner, "The drink you pour is the tastiest," and have them pour you one. 2
Take a drink, then ask, "Want to... have just one more drink with me?" 2
Stare lovingly at your partner while they're eating a snack, then take a drink. 2
Take a drink, then say, "There's... something special between us tonight." 2
Describe your ideal relationship (e.g., "A love where we can see each other every day") and take a drink. 2
Take a drink, and say sincerely, "I want to be a good person for you." 2
Hold your partner's hand, interlace your fingers, then ask, "Is this... a good sign?" and take a drink. 2
Take a drink, then suggest, "Should we... go somewhere private?" 2
Talk about the moment you first opened up your heart to your partner, then take a drink. 2
Take a drink and say wistfully, "Time flies when I'm with you." 2
Point out the moment today when your partner looked their best (cutest/coolest), and take a drink. 2
Take a drink, then ask suggestively, "Will you... put me to bed?" 2
Talk about a positive future you imagine with your partner, and take a drink. 2
Take a drink, then say, "I want to... get deeper with you." 2
Ask who your partner's ideal type is, then (forcefully) find a similarity to you and take a drink! 2
Take a drink, then ask, "What do you... think of me?" 2
Take a drink, and say sincerely, "I'm just... so happy I'm with you." 2
State the value you think is most important in a relationship (e.g., "Trust") and take a drink. 2
Take a drink, then say, "I want to know... everything about you." 2
Name one thing from your bucket list you want to do with your partner, and take a drink. 2
Take a drink, then say, "You really are... a special person to me." 2
Define what "love" means to you (romantically), and take a drink. 2
Take a drink, then say, "As long as I'm with you, I feel like I can do anything." 2
Casually sit on your partner's lap and take a drink. 2
Take a drink, then sincerely tell your partner, "You look truly beautiful/handsome tonight." 2
Give your partner a surprise kiss on the cheek! Then (shyly) take a drink! 2
Whisper "I love you" in your partner's ear and take a drink. 2
Talk about a date you want to go on next, and drink one each with excitement! 2
Compliment the most attractive feature (physical or otherwise) you see in each other, and one drink each! 2
Take a drink, then share a deep, breathless kiss for 20 seconds.  3
Leave a trail with your lips on your partner's neck for 10 seconds, and take a drink.  3
Ask, "What's your... secret color?" If you guess right, they drink. If wrong, you drink two! 3
Take a drink, then whisper and describe that "something special" you want to do with your partner tonight. 3
Slide your hand under your partner's top and feel their warm skin, caressing their back for 10 seconds.  3
Give that "special touch" you know your partner loves most for 20 seconds, then take a drink.  3

Take a drink, then say, "You... feel like you could be addictive." 3

"Sexily" describe what you imagine your partner looks like showering, and take a drink. 3
